attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: This app is not helpful at all and could be way better

attributes.title: I CANT 🤢🤮
attributes.review: I just got the app but I didn’t know it was a zoo and the star of the app is a pig I am very disappointed just erase this app already!!

attributes.title: It sucked tbh
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app a saw a cheese Cheeto like for what , why 😭 my poor eyes , it’s not a good app to go on , it isn’t good ..wouldn’t recommend 😬

attributes.title: Waist of time🙂
attributes.review: When I opened the app I seen a man with barley some hair on his head and very wrinkly😪 that’s definitely gonna give me nightmares😕

attributes.title: Way too liberal
attributes.review: This app promised me to be American and the best and it was not. I didn’t get to show my Americanism and they barley spoke good American. I think this pres is becoming such a leftist socialist commie

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I opened this app to someone dancing like a fish in a hot Cheeto costume and it was gross I was very disturbed I did not like what I saw. I would like for this app to be taken down!

attributes.title: No horrible
attributes.review: I hate this app it’s the most stupidest thing I have ever experienced in my life what a waste of time

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: This app is absolutely TERRIBLE. There’s no nicer way to say it. I opend it and I saw a racist, rapist chetto. I now need bleach for my eyes. I’m disgusted. I also saw him in a pool right when I opend the app and DISGUSTING. 🧚‍♂️❤️ 1 star 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: Help
attributes.review: This app stole all my money and family members pls take it down apple it could hurt people luckily I didn’t die 😔✌🏽
This app is absolutely terrible and should be thrown in the TRASH... I don’t feel like I need to express anymore 🙂.
